grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 玩具銃【ガングジュウ】toy gun
賞玩【ショウガン】appreciation, admiration, enjoyment
食玩【ショクガン】small toy sold with food, premium
kun reading compounds: 弄ぶ【もてあそぶ】to play with (a toy, one's hair, etc.), to fiddle with, to toy with (one's emotions, etc.), to trifle with, to do with something as one pleases, to appreciate
